item.title: Migrate to Hugo - Goodbye Jekyll
item.description:
Github pages render Jekyll source natively. That’s nice and that was the reason I use it for this page - until now. I have some plans and just want to do a facelift/upgrade to my pages. So here it is: the new appearance using Hugo static page generator. Yes, sure.. github can’t render the source natively, I have to push the rendering output manually (or let a bot handle that).

My old page will be moved to a new repo ghplegacy.
